local_intent: execute grasp of white_plate: detect, compute grasp pose, approach, pick with retries, verify stability
assumptions: white_plate is visible or will be detected by DetectObject
ComputeGraspPose will produce a valid pose stored as white_plate_grasp
ApproachAndAlign can reach the computed grasp within timeout
coherence_with_global: Implements the 'grasp' phase from the global plan: perception (DetectObject), grasp computation (ComputeGraspPose), precise approach (ApproachAndAlign), execution with retry (Pick), and verification (IsGraspStable). Values conform to global BT ports and port_value_spaces.
